alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 08 at 9:35PM EST until November 09 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Mainly at higher elevations. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Onondaga and Cortland counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest chance for a light glaze of ice will be across the higher terrain of southern Onondaga County and Cortland County. Ice will be mainly confined to colder, elevated surfaces, but could also impact bridges and overpasses. Temperatures will rise above freezing after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
